bibl.title: Ἀντιφίλησις. Studies on Classical, Byzantine and Modern Greek Literature and Culture in Honour of John-Theophanes A. Papademetriou.
bibl.note: 66 contributions. - Pp. 13-17: E.K. and E.D.M., Preface.
KARAMALENGOU Eleni and Eugenia D. MAKRYGIANNI (Edd.), Ἀντιφίλησις. Studies on Classical, Byzantine and Modern Greek Literature and Culture in Honour of John-Theophanes A. Papademetriou.
Stuttgart, Fr. Steiner, 2009, 8°, 656 pp., 1 frontispice, figg. ISBN 978-3-515-08488-8. €84.
